name: Yobachi: The Trials of The Tiger
name_original: Yobachi: The Trials of The Tiger
description: Yobachi: The Trials of the Tiger is a 2D action-adventure platform game with a role-playing game (RPG) element. The game is built on Construct 3 and the animation is done in Adobe Illustrator, Adobe After Effect and Adobe Premier Pro. This game is made by the DHA Society consisting of MC249 students from UiTM Shah Alam, Malaysia. This game is a final year project for the Creative Content Development 2 (NMC611) course.
